Source code for havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.bios.models.dl380gen10_bios

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

import re

from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.bios.system_bios import SystemBios
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval_exceptions import TestError



[docs]class DL380Gen10Bios(SystemBios):

    def _run_script(self, cmd, dut_dir):
        # BIOS upgrades on DL380 can return a non-zero exit code, so ignore
        # status here
        self.host.run(  # noqa
            cmd, timeout=1800, working_directory=dut_dir, ignore_status=True
        )


[docs]    def get_bios_ver(self):
        cmd = "dmidecode -t bios"
        out = self.host.run(cmd)

        # For DL380 BIOS version we combine Version and Release Date field
        # Version: U30
        # Release Date: 12/29/2018

        pattern = re.compile(r"Version:\s+(\w+)", re.MULTILINE)
        match = re.search(pattern, out)
        if match:
            ver = str(match.group(1))
        else:
            raise TestError("Did not find BIOS version in dmidecode output")

        pattern = re.compile(r"Release Date:\s+(\S+)", re.MULTILINE)
        match = re.search(pattern, out)
        if match:
            rel_date = str(match.group(1))
            rel_date = rel_date.replace("/", "")
        else:
            raise TestError("Did not find BIOS release date in dmidecode output")

        return ver + "_" + rel_date



[docs]    def cycle_post_bios_upgrade(self):
        self.host.inband.reboot(shutdown_cmd=True)
